messages.Anant M: Hi, there.I notice that in my status when I check requiredTop Rated eligible weeks. Theire counting is some time imcrecase and some some time dectrease.. why this happaning I don't know but let me know that how Up-work count these weeks..?Check the attacehd snapsote.. in that you can seeTop Rated eligible weeks 10 of 16... so some time it's sowen like 8 pf 16 , 6 of 16.... etc ..And some time it shows like 10 of 16, 11 of 16... just like this.. so let me know that how Up-work is counting these week.Thanks.
messages.Petra R: Theire counting is some time imcrecase and some some time dectrease.. why this happaning I don't knowIt is because the number of non eligible weeks in your 16 week rolling window changes.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Re: Profile hide for other freelancer

messages.Anant M: Hi, Up-work.I'm a freelacer and I want to hide my profile for any other freelancer. That means any other freelancer can not see my Profile. any client can see but any freelancer just like me can not see my profile..I want to do that. IS that any chance to do that..???Please let me know and guid me that how to do..Thanks in advance.
messages.Seyed J: Hi,As I know, you can't achieve this. There is no option to show your profile to all the clients and hide it for all freelancers.There are three options on UpWork for profile visibility which is:I think the best option for you is to use the Private mode.You can change your Profile Visibility on the UpWork homepage (click on the Find Work link under Find Work on the header navigation). Find for Visibility in the sidebar and edit it.I hope it helps.
messages.Preston H: If you don't want someone to see something, don't put it online.It does not make sense to try to block one individual (or block ONLY freelancers) from seeing your profile page. I could look at your profile page and send a copy of it to that individual. Anyone who is a client might also be a freelancer.Upwork is not intended as a tool for hiding information. It is intended as tool for maximizing a freelancer's exposure to potential clients. So blocking people from seeing our profile pages (which are our online billboards) isn't really at the heart of what the system is all about.
messages.Petra R: any client can see but any freelancer just like me can not see my profile..Why?IS that any chance to do that..???No, there is no chance to do that.

messages.Jaaziyah S: Does anyone know how I can get in touch with someone from Upwork?Get help button is not working and I am unable to delete manual hours from my work diary.
messages.Bojan S: HiJaaziyah,You should be able to delete yourtime in the current week’s Work Diary in an active contract.Could you please share more information about the issue you're experiencing when you try to delete the time from your Work Diary so that we can assist you accordingly?Thank you!
messages.Preston H: You don't need to work through Upwork. If you end up with hours getting billed to the client that you don't want the client to pay for, all you need to do is send the client a refund.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/New-to-U.title: Re: Get Profile Feedback from Experienced Freelancers on Upwork

messages.Koorosh M: Greetings;May you please review my profile? It's like 3 days with 20 propsals scince I got back to Upwork. But no interviews. I would like to know what is the problem with my profile.Best regards.Farewell.
messages.Eva H: I have read "Getting Started" tips, attended the "Getting Started" webinar, and tried many different approaches to my proposal structure. (including a willingness to work for very low fees just to establish a reputation on here) I have a clear understanding of my competitive advantage message. I am a very seasoned professional, just new to Upwork.Any advice on breaking this no-hire spell? Thank you so much in advance!EvaPS-To add insult to injury my profile was "hidden" for "lack of earnings". It's not due to not trying and being penalized is not helping the matter.
messages.Aditi J: Eva, I hear you. I have been in spots where Upwork terms and conditions seemed unhelpful. But it is the freelancer community that helped me to navigate this framework. You are in the right spot. Apart from me, other more experienced freelancers may have suggestions for you too. So please check back periodically.1) Consider adding a video to your profile. When I looked at high earners in your field (e.g. Melissa, or Courtney), adding video seems to be a norm. If you disagree, you might want to change your title. I used your title to do a search and these freelancers showed up.2) Consider adding more portfolio items. These items can be from your assignments on other platforms or sample assignments that you created solely for portfolio purposes. (Although Melissa and Courtney did not have an exhaustive portfolio, several other have 10+ items).3) Consider developing catalog products/pre-packaged products. A potential client can reach you in three different ways- look at your profile and send you a direct message, Or they post a job and you respond to it. Or they look at a catalog product that you have and hire you. At present, you do not have catalog products. Connect with Upwork rep if you need more information about Catalogs. (I myself have not yet developed Catalog products due to technical glitches but I plan to do it during the Spring break.)Hope this helps, I'm rooting for your success.
messages.Tahmid C: I am a CMS, Shopify and Laravel developer. Looking to start my journey at Upwork. I will really appriciate if someone reviews my profile.Thank you
messages.Joseph T: Greetings Upwork Family!I am unable to secure high-paying jobs/projects yet I am a Top-Rated freelancer. I have tried every trick 'in the book' and feel that I have hit a dead-end. I am outof ideas! So far, I have;a. Updated my profile accordingly.b. Implemented all the tips I have learnt on bidding for jobs(which worked just fine last year).I have not received any invitations by clients, yet I got so many last year.What do you advise/recommend that I do? Thank you in advance.
messages.Robin H: Greetings Upwork Family!I am unable to secure high-paying jobs/projects yet I am a Top-Rated freelancer. I have tried every trick 'in the book' and feel that I have hit a dead-end. I am outof ideas! So far, I have;a. Updated my profile accordingly.b. Implemented all the tips I have learnt on bidding for jobs(which worked just fine last year).I have not received any invitations by clients, yet I got so many last year.What do you advise/recommend that I do? Thank you in advance.I'm a marketing copywriter. Check out my profile and compare it with yours. You list qualifications, but you have no story. As a content writer, I expect more. Why hire you rather than the other Top-Rated freelancers? It's really hard to get started on the platform so you need to find ways to stand out.Likewise, your proposals need to be customized to each job post.
messages.Natalie B: Hello, Upwork community,I am really confused as to why I get virtually no response to my proposals. I don't have a JSS, but I have 6 5 star reviews with amazing feedback. I only apply to jobs I know I can really do well, but it seems like I'm wasting my time as nobody is even viewing my profile (I see I had one view this past week which is the same as the previous week), but I have sent out around 44 proposals this year. Please can someone share some insight? Is there an algorithm that pushes the more Upwork experienced freelancers above those less experienced? I would really, really appreciate if some of you amazing freelancers could have a look at my profile and share some thoughts on why I am not being successful?Here is a link to my profile:Natalie Bowman UpWork ProfileThank you so much, Natalie

messages.Radovan R: Hello, I am new to Upwork and struggling with a issue. Please I need help.I have to verify my identity according to notice. If I click on "Chat Now" button in "Visual verification" window than it opens "Upwork Help dashboard" (this page is the story itself - with full of bugs - everytime I click on something it redirects me to dashboard). In main Upwork card there is window "Wait for the visual ID check" but after a while it times out with text "Timed out on waiting for agent to verify your identity".I tested it on the newest Chrome browser and Firefox. I have fully functional microphone and webcam. There is no blocked popup window and microphone and webcam are allowed to use for page Upwork.I saw a lot of tickets and topics related with this problem and I am asking myself, why people still have this problem after tons of tickets.I spent too much time for resolve this problem and I am sure that this is not problem on my side. I can imagine that time would be spend much better. Please, I just want to make a money and don't waste time with useless things.Thank you for any helpful information and assistance.Best regards,Radovan.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Is bonus shows on hourly contract without any tracked time?

messages.Seyed J: Hello everyone,I had an hourly contract with one of my clients. We agreed to $100 to accomplish the job. As it was a small project, I didn't track my work diary and I couldn't add it manually because I accomplished the job in less than one hour and $100 is 4 hours of my hourly rate.So I didn't track any time in the work diary. He adds a $100 bonus to the contract and we finished the contract successfully with great feedback.I want to know, is this bonus and the job will show in my profile soon with $100 price or it won't appear because I didn't track any time?

messages.Samuel T: Hi,A few days ago I sent a previous client a recommendation request to which they have filled out and sent. The notification still says 'Pending' but I am looking to find out whether it wasn't sent correctly, or that it is waiting for confirmation by Upwork?Thank you,Sam
messages.Aleksandar D: Hi Samuel,While the quoted review time is within 10 days, please know in most cases we complete our review within 5 days.We truly appreciate your patience through this process!Thank you.
messages.Olufemi O: Hello, I requested a testimonial from 2 of my clients and they said Upwork didn't notify them on LinkedIn. Please what's wrong?
messages.Goran V: HiOlufemi,While we are excited to share that the feature is proving to be very popular unfortunately we've received so many requests that it's taking us a while to review each one. As a result, please allow 10 business days for your request to be reviewed. We apologize for the delay, but please know we are still testing and optimizing this beta feature. Thanks!
messages.Keith F: A client of mine (from outside UpWork has left a testimonial for me but it was not approved as the contact information could not be verified; a valid LinkedIn profile was provided, along with an email address which was made up of their name, matching that of LinkedIn. It is an entirely valid testimonial, I am just wondering why it may have been declined and how I can have it reviewed?ThanksKeith
messages.Bojan S: Hi Keith,Looks like your testimonial request is still under review. While the quoted review time is within 10 days, please know in most cases we complete our review within 5 days. We truly appreciate your patience through this process!
